title: An Act amending the charter of the town of Rockland

abstracts.abstract: Senate, November 13, 2025 -- The committee on Municipalities and Regional Government to whom was referred the petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 2573) of John F. Keenan (by vote of the town) to amend the charter of the town of Rockland, report the accompanying bill (Senate, No. 2716).

actions.description: Reported from the committee on Municipalities and Regional Government
Bill reported favorably by committee and placed in the Orders of the Day for the next session
Taken out of the Orders of the Day
Read second, amended, ordered to a third reading, read third and passed to be engrossed
Read; and referred to the committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling

related_entities.name: committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling
the committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling

actions.description: Committee reported that the matter be placed in the Orders of the Day for the next sitting
Read second and ordered to a third reading
Read third, amended by substitution of a new text (H4866) and passed to be engrossed

sponsorships.name: Joint Committee on Municipalities and Regional Government
